name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta, mix with eggs, bacon, cheese.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry chicken and veggies, serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Boil veggies in broth.

name: Butter Chicken

name: Aloo Gobi

name: Dal Tadka

name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Layer marinated chicken and rice, cook with aromatic spices.

name: Rogan Josh

name: Samosa

name: Idli
instructions: Ferment batter and steam into soft cakes.

name: Dosa
instructions: Spread fermented batter on hot griddle and cook.
